title: GPT external detection overlay v0
description: Shadow-only overlay summarising internal vs external GPT usage by vendor/model/product.

version.description: Overlay version identifier (kept for v0 compatibility).

created_at.description: Timestamp when this overlay JSON was created.

source.description: Optional short string describing the overlay source (e.g. builder script name).

input_file.description: Path to the log file used by the detector (kept for v0 compatibility).

records.description: Total number of log records processed by the detector (kept for v0 compatibility).

total_records.description: Total number of log records seen by the detector.

num_external_gpt.description: Number of calls attributed to external GPT providers.

num_internal.description: Number of calls attributed to internal/HPC providers.

num_unknown.description: Number of calls where origin could not be classified.

vendors.description: Per-vendor summary emitted by the current detector.

models.description: Per-model summary emitted by the current detector.

total_calls.description: Optional alias for total_records, used by future builders.

internal_calls.description: Optional alias for num_internal, used by future builders.

external_calls.description: Optional alias for num_external_gpt, used by future builders.

top_vendors.description: Top vendors by total calls (small slice for snapshot).

top_models.description: Top models by total calls (small slice for snapshot).

diagnostics.description: Free-form diagnostics for log coverage, filters, etc.

vendor_summary.description: Loose vendor summary shape (kept intentionally permissive for v0).

model_summary.description: Loose model summary shape (kept intentionally permissive for v0).
